fields.title: Harris 1980 Americans and the Arts Survey III, study no. 802519

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue:
Survey focuses on use of leisure time and support for the arts

"Additional variables include accessibility to sports, cultural, or educational events; importance of arts and cultural events to business and to the community; high cost of such cultural activities; rate of attendance; importance of the arts to children; preference for TV or live performances; and attendance at museums"

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Harris used a random-multi-stage cluster sampling design to obtain a national cross-section sample of U.S. adults; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-8025-19;
